verbs.description: A day after [ARG0: he] [V: took] [ARG1: a swipe] [ARG2: at President Donald Trump] , Robert De Niro has offered an apology , not to the commander - in - chief but for him .
A day after he took a swipe at President Donald Trump , Robert De Niro [V: has] offered an apology , not to the commander - in - chief but for him .
[ARGM-TMP: A day after he took a swipe at President Donald Trump] , [ARG0: Robert De Niro] has [V: offered] [ARG1: an apology] , [ARG1: not to the commander - in - chief but for him] .
